item.description:
As you will recall, a few weeks ago I put a call out to those interested in a RAW Food Class. I received seven (7) responses - in which, these people will have first seating for this class. Therefore, there is only ONE opening available... unless one of the individuals who said yes cannot attend. In that case, WE WILL HAVE A WAITING LIST.


DETAILS OF THE CLASS:

Shura Baryshnikov is a vegan raw foods chef and instructor who has done Alissa Cohen's Living on Live Foods certification and studied at Grezzo, Alissa's premier raw foods restaurant in the North End in Boston. Shura is currently consulting at the Garden Grille in Pawtucket and teaching prep classes to local folks interested in raw foods. Feel free to check out her website at http://www.rawteacher....

This introductory class will cover the major principles of vegan raw food preparation, including smoothies, dressings, salads, soups, sprouting and desserts. We'll make a bit of everything and snack on everything we make, so definitely come hungry! Delicious food awaits you.


DIRECTIONS TO THE CLASS:

The class will be held at:

238 Armington St.
Cranston, RI 02905
Contact #: 401 952 3514.

CLASS TIME: 1-4 pm

From 95 North and South, take

Exit 18, Thurbers Ave.

Follow ramp down to RI-1A/Allens Ave.

Right at the light onto Allens Ave/Naragnassett Blvd. (you will now be traveling south)

After a few miles, you will pass Johnson and Wales Harborside campus on the left and Armington will be the fourth street on your right after the campus entrance.

Turn Right onto Armington.

238 is towards the end of the street on the left. Please park on the street and walk down to the red carriage house at the end of the drive.

PLEASE BRING YOUR $35.00 PAYMENT TO THE CLASS.

WE WILL ALL PAY SHURA THE DAY OF.

group.name: Rhode Island Vegetarian and Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: RAW FOOD CLASS (Only ONE Opening Left)
